name: Ki11er Clutter
description:
The most amazing Clutter yet, with over 1700 puzzles to keep you playing for days and days.

The 11th installment of the ever-popular Clutter offers so many new Clutter variations, along with old favorites for a truly unforgettable Quest. The hardest, most challenging Clutter ever was created for your enjoyment, with highly addicting and replayable levels.

A host of puzzles is waiting to be explored, including Sliders, Square Jigsaws & Box Quotes. And wait until you see the Dancing Doughnuts & the White Cubes!

You've never seen Clutter this fast, furious and challenging!
And as always, the options let you play Clutter the way you want: Favorites are back so you can collect the puzzles you want to play again and again.

  • New Object Sets & Many New Gameplay Modes
  • Over 1700 levels and a very challenging 144 level Main Quest
  • Over 100 picture puzzles and box quotes puzzles
  • Randomly generated levels mean endless replayability
  • Original Quest Music by the incomparable Mike Sal (Kix Kreative)
